title: Ticket #7425: need docs, howto, recipes for configuring TOKEN auth
description: We need clear examples on the wiki or in the manual (not PowerPoint) for how to configure the new TOKEN authentication mechanism in HTCondor
remarks:
2019-Dec-11 16:56:34 by blin:
An OSG site, University of Puerto Rico, has expressed interest in setting up their pool with TOKEN auth so we're interested in a recipe that we can hand off to them.

2019-Dec-12 07:55:38 by bbockelm:
A good start would be the TOKEN howto in the manual: https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/admin-manual/security.html#quick-configuration-of-security

And the TOKEN authentication section: https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/admin-manual/security.html#token-authentication

2019-Dec-19 09:44:17 by blin:
Those docs LGTM so I've passed those docs along to UPR. I think that means we can close this ticket.
